description: Consolidated list of all user stories from all categories

stories.title: Client-Specific Story Access
stories.userStory: As a logged-in client, I can only view user stories that have been explicitly shared with me by the admin or PM.

stories.title: Backlog Story Viewer
stories.userStory: As a client, I can see a list of user stories with expandable detail (not editable), including story points and business value.

stories.title: Scope Matrix Drag-and-Drop (Effort Validated)
stories.userStory: As a client, I can drag and drop features into the scope matrix. If effort is mismatched for a column, the system prompts me with effort adjustment options.

stories.title: Business Value Mismatch Explanation
stories.userStory: When I move a low-value item into a high-priority scope bucket (or vice versa), the system explains the meaning of this mismatch with distinct contextual messages.

stories.title: Real-Time Scope Metrics Panel
stories.userStory: As a client or admin, I want to see live scope metrics like total story points, estimated dev days, and projected cost as I change the scope matrix.

stories.title: Scenario Presets and Reset
stories.userStory: As a user, I can load recommended configurations such as MVP or Legacy Parity and reset my scope decisions to predefined presets.

stories.title: Save and Load Scenarios
stories.userStory: As a client, I can save scope matrix configurations and reload them later for comparison or revision.

stories.title: Adjustable Cost Settings
stories.userStory: As a user, I can adjust developer hourly rate and team size to see how they affect cost estimates in real time.

stories.title: Role-Based Permissions and Visibility
stories.userStory: As a system admin, I can manage user roles and restrict which parts of the interface different roles can see or interact with.

stories.title: Drag-and-Drop Interaction Hints
stories.userStory: As a client, I receive immediate visual or textual feedback when attempting a drop that would violate matrix rules.

stories.title: Export Scenario to PDF or Share Link
stories.userStory: As a client or PM, I can export the current scope matrix and metrics as a PDF or generate a shareable link.

stories.title: AI-Assisted Story Creation
stories.userStory: As a PM, I can use AI to help draft new user stories based on project requirements and existing stories.

stories.title: Historical Comparison Dashboard
stories.userStory: As a client or PM, I can view how current estimates compare to historical projects with similar scope and complexity.

stories.title: Team Composition Impact Analysis
stories.userStory: As a PM, I can adjust the senior/mid/junior ratio of the team and see how it affects timeline and cost.

stories.title: AI Factor Simulation
stories.userStory: As a client, I can see simulated impacts of enabling/disabling various AI productivity boosters on project timeline and cost.

stories.title: Remove Stories from Matrix
stories.userStory: As a product manager, I want to be able to remove stories from the matrix and return them to the backlog when priorities change or stories are incorrectly placed.

stories.title: Multi-Project Resource Allocation
stories.userStory: As a PM managing multiple projects, I can see how developer allocation across projects affects each project's timeline.

stories.title: Workday Calendar Customization
stories.userStory: As a PM, I can customize working days calendar to account for holidays in specific regions and company-specific non-working days.

stories.title: Risk Factor Adjustment
stories.userStory: As a PM, I can add risk factors to specific stories or the entire project and see how they affect the confidence level of estimates.

stories.title: Story Card Ranking
stories.userStory: As a product manager, I want to rank story cards within a matrix cell to indicate priority order for implementation within the same value and effort bucket.

stories.title: Drag and Drop Visual Feedback
stories.userStory: As a user, I want clear visual feedback during drag and drop operations so I can easily see valid drop zones and story placement options.

stories.title: Scenario Saving Enhancement
stories.userStory: As a product manager, I want to save my scenario configurations including story positions, rankings, and adjustments so I can revisit them later.

stories.title: Weighted Scoring for Value Estimation
stories.userStory: As a PM, I can apply a weighted scoring formula to stories (e.g., ROI × urgency × feasibility) to better prioritize scope.

stories.title: Backlog Story Management
stories.userStory: As a product manager, I want to create, edit, and delete user stories directly in the backlog, so I can efficiently manage the product backlog without leaving the application.
